description:
Ritsu is having trouble writing up the proposal for his first manga project. 
Amidst his trouble, Takano`s friend from the sales department, Yokozawa, declares that "Masamune is mine". Ritsu can`t hide that he`s shaken, but then he runs into Takano at a bar he ended up with his friend...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coming Events Cast Their Shadows Before Them.
Coming Events Cast Their Shadows Before Them.
